description: Decades ago, tailors would learn their craft by sewing together shirts made from fabric remnants. Over time, a staple of playful preppy style evolved from the practice—the fun shirt. This seersucker version is designed with a shorter length that's perfect for wearing untucked.
fitting_details: Features a shorter length—perfect for wearing untucked.
Size Big 2X has a 32" back body length, a 22" shoulder, and a 62¼" chest.
Size Tall 2L has a 35" back body length, a 22½" shoulder, and a 62¼" chest.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.
Signature embroidered Pony at the pocket.
